resources.string: This sandwich is stunningly delicious and tastes as good as it is healthy. Toast bread well.If using a very dense bread or a rye or pumpernickel double or even triple toast.

Put kale in a pot with 3 to 4 inches of water in the bottom. Bring to a boil, cover, and cook until tender, 3 to 5 minutes; check frequently. Kale is good when cooked to an almost spinachlike tenderness.

Spread the toast thickly with hummus, sprinkle with green onions, pile cilantro on top of the green onions, and then place lemon slices over the cilantro
Cut the ends off the lemon, zest them, then squeeze the juice from the ends into a bowl with the zest. Discard the ends. VERY thinly slice the main part of the lemon and set aside.
